Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: ஒளிஒருவற்கு உள்ள வெறுக்கை இளிஒருவற்குஅஃதிறந்து வாழ்தும் எனல்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The light of life is mental energy; disgrace is his Who says, 'I 'ill lead a happy life devoid of this.'

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A stark contrast between two figures. On one side, a person whose heart radiates a brilliant, golden light ('Oli'), symbolizing their inner strength and courage ('Ulla Verukkai'). On the other, a figure sits in opulence but their form is shadowy and translucent, representing a disgraceful, empty existence ('Ilivu').
Layered_Composition.Midground: The radiant figure stands on a rugged, challenging path, yet their light illuminates the way forward. The shadowy figure is surrounded by wilting luxuries and fading colors.
Layered_Composition.Background: A vast, dramatic sky. On the side of the radiant figure, it is a hopeful dawn. On the side of the shadowy figure, it is a bleak, colorless dusk.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A visual dichotomy between a life of honor derived from inner strength versus a life of disgrace from lacking that essential energy, regardless of external wealth.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The radiant heart is the symbol of 'Oli' (light/glory) and 'Ulla Verukkai' (mental energy). The translucent, shadowy form symbolizes 'Ilivu' (disgrace).
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Heroic and inspiring on one side, hollow and pathetic on the other. A strong, contemplative contrast.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: Intense, warm, golden light emanating from the strong figure, contrasted with cool, dim, and desaturated colors surrounding the disgraceful one. High dynamic range.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Ultra-wide cinematic shot, dramatic low angle, emphasizing the heroic stature of the radiant figure.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with strong visual effects for the light and shadows.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: God rays, volumetric lighting from the heart, contrasted with flat, lifeless lighting on the other side.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Symbolic fantasy realism, akin to a concept art piece for an epic film.

Negative_Prompt: neutral mood, cartoon, blurry, deformed figures, text artifacts, modern clothing, flat composition.
